Original: I'd like for you to head to the [Color:5]Old
Forest Mine[Color:0] on the outskirts of the
city and excavate some [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0].
[Page]
We had thought the vein was mined dry,
but the other day, a certain explorer
found that there was more to be had.
[Page]
The [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] is a pretty thing.
Shine light on it, and it refracts it
into all the colors of the rainbow...
[Page]
But its true worth is not found in its
beauty! Though I'll explain more about
that if you complete the mission.
[Page]
Now, do I understand right that you've
only recently arrived in Tharsis?
You must lack the proper essentials.
[Page]
So I'll pay half of the reward for
this mission in advance. Use that to
purchase whatever you'll need.
Translation: I'd like for you to head to the [Color:5]Old
Forest Mine[Color:0] on the outskirts of the
city and excavate some [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0].
[Page]
We had thought the vein was mined dry,
but the other day, a certain explorer
found that there was more to be had.
[Page]
The [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] is a pretty thing.
Shine light on it, and it refracts it
into all the colors of the rainbow...
[Page]
But its true worth is not found in its
beauty! Though I'll explain more about
that if you complete the mission.
[Page]
Now, do I understand right that you've
only recently arrived in Tharsis?
You must lack the proper essentials.
[Page]
So I'll pay half of the reward for
this mission in advance. Use that to
purchase whatever you'll need.

Original: The Old Forest Mine is the perfect
place to test your skills. You'll need
all your strength and cunning there.
[Page]
Once you're ready, head to the city
gates, and I'll have a soldier waiting
to escort you there. Best of luck!
Translation: The Old Forest Mine is the perfect
place to test your skills. You'll need
all your strength and cunning there.
[Page]
Once you're ready, head to the city
gates, and I'll have a soldier waiting
to escort you there. Best of luck!

Original: Well done, members of the [Guild]
Guild! I see you've brought back a
fine sample of the [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0].
[Page]
I now pronounce the [Guild] Guild
to be explorers of Tharsis with my
official blessing!
[Page]
And of course, there is the other half
of your reward to be given. Here you
are, then...
Translation: Well done, members of the [Guild]
Guild! I see you've brought back a
fine sample of the [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0].
[Page]
I now pronounce the [Guild] Guild
to be explorers of Tharsis with my
official blessing!
[Page]
And of course, there is the other half
of your reward to be given. Here you
are, then...

Original: Now, to the main topic of discussion.
Since you have proven your worth, your
guild merits a [Color:5]skyship[Color:0].
[Page]
It's a vessel that sails the skies,
powered by [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0]. You'll be
searching for Yggdrasil on one.
[Page]
Your skyship is ready now at the city
gates. Once you claim it, why not make
the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0] your first stop?
[Page]
The Lush Woodlands is a large, natural
labyrinth currently being investigated
by many of our explorers.
[Page]
Once you reach the Lush Woodlands,
head straight for the [Color:5]pillar of light[Color:0]
you'll see. It's an invaluable tool.
[Page]
Oh, and stop by the atelier before
you go. I sent them my authorization
for you to buy certain necessities.
[Page]
Well then, may your way be clear!
Translation: Now, to the main topic of discussion.
Since you have proven your worth, your
guild merits a [Color:5]skyship[Color:0].
[Page]
It's a vessel that sails the skies,
powered by [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0]. You'll be
searching for Yggdrasil on one.
[Page]
Your skyship is ready now at the city
gates. Once you claim it, why not make
the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0] your first stop?
[Page]
The Lush Woodlands is a large, natural
labyrinth currently being investigated
by many of our explorers.
[Page]
Once you reach the Lush Woodlands,
head straight for the [Color:5]pillar of light[Color:0]
you'll see. It's an invaluable tool.
[Page]
Oh, and stop by the atelier before
you go. I sent them my authorization
for you to buy certain necessities.
[Page]
Well then, may your way be clear!

Original: "You're the [Guild] Guild, right?
I'm here from the Outland Count."
[Page]
"Before we leave, you're sure you're
ready for this? Whatever skills you
have are useless if not trained."
[Page]
[Color:3]Each party member begins with
[Color:5]3 Skill Points[Color:3] as a starting point
for the adventure.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You should spend them on skills that
will be useful in battle and during
exploration.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]If you have not trained any skills
yet, open the Main Menu with the
Y Button and select the Custom menu.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]There are attack skills, healing
skills, defensive skills... Train the
ones you feel you will most need.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You are awarded 1 Skill Point each
time you level up.[Color:0]
[Page]
"So, what'll it be? Should we head
straight for the [Color:5]Old Forest Mine[Color:0]?"
Translation: "You're the [Guild] Guild, right?
I'm here from the Outland Count."
[Page]
"Before we leave, you're sure you're
ready for this? Whatever skills you
have are useless if not trained."
[Page]
[Color:3]Each party member begins with
[Color:5]3 Skill Points[Color:3] as a starting point
for the adventure.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You should spend them on skills that
will be useful in battle and during
exploration.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]If you have not trained any skills
yet, open the Main Menu with the
Y Button and select the Custom menu.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]There are attack skills, healing
skills, defensive skills... Train the
ones you feel you will most need.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You are awarded 1 Skill Point each
time you level up.[Color:0]
[Page]
"So, what'll it be? Should we head
straight for the [Color:5]Old Forest Mine[Color:0]?"

Original: "Back, I see. What'll it be, then?
Are you ready to head for the
[Color:5]Old Forest Mine[Color:0]?"
Translation: "Back, I see. What'll it be, then?
Are you ready to head for the
[Color:5]Old Forest Mine[Color:0]?"

Original: [Color:5]Go to the Old Forest Mine?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Go to the Old Forest Mine?[Color:0]

Original: "Alright, then follow me."
Translation: "Alright, then follow me."

Original: "All right. Take your time preparing
and come back when you're ready."
Translation: "All right. Take your time preparing
and come back when you're ready."

Original: [Color:5]Return to the city?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Return to the city?[Color:0]

Original: As you proceed down the forest path,
you eventually reach a fork in
the road.
Translation: As you proceed down the forest path,
you eventually reach a fork in
the road.

Original: Across the water, you see a shining
patch of ground. It seems something
buried shallowly is reflecting light.
[Page]
Judging by the map you received from
Whirlwind, the [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] you seek
can be mined there.
[Page]
But the water between you and your
prize is too deep to cross. You frown
and begin looking for another route.
Translation: Across the water, you see a shining
patch of ground. It seems something
buried shallowly is reflecting light.
[Page]
Judging by the map you received from
Whirlwind, the [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] you seek
can be mined there.
[Page]
But the water between you and your
prize is too deep to cross. You frown
and begin looking for another route.

Original: At last, you have mined the
[Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] you came for!
Your mission is now complete.
[Page]
The ore won after many tense moments
near powerful monsters is lighter than
you'd imagined and feels fragile...
[Page]
After you finish exulting in your
accomplishment, you stow the shining
stone and begin your trek back.
Translation: At last, you have mined the
[Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] you came for!
Your mission is now complete.
[Page]
The ore won after many tense moments
near powerful monsters is lighter than
you'd imagined and feels fragile...
[Page]
After you finish exulting in your
accomplishment, you stow the shining
stone and begin your trek back.

Original: You check your knapsack again to make
certain that the [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] you
put away is still there.
[Page]
The final step before completing your
mission will be to visit the Grand
Court and report your find.
Translation: You check your knapsack again to make
certain that the [Color:6][Item:1173][Color:0] you
put away is still there.
[Page]
The final step before completing your
mission will be to visit the Grand
Court and report your find.
